name: plant (nanoswatch)
description:
leave it in the corner of your screen and water it when it needs it and maybe something will happen (may take a while)

This was my first time using a dedicated game engine; I ended up having to implement my backup idea in the last 24 hours of the jam, but it was super cool to get to play with Godot. Thanks for hosting the jam!

(Sorry in advance if it doesn't export well, I ran out of time to test it)

(There's a secret mode: it's somewhere on the alphabetical keyboard, but you can disable it with Q)

(There's also a few distinct outcomes)
